mapper.sql: select produceId, founderId, produceName, produceText, produceImage, produceCredit, produceNum, customer, updateTime, registerTime from producetable
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO producetable (produceName, founderId, produceText, produceImage, produceCredit, produceNum, customer, updateTime, registerTime) values (#{produceName},#{founderId}, #{produceText}, #{produceImage}, #{produceCredit}, #{produceNum}, #{customer}, #{updateTime}, #{registerTime})
mapper.update: update producetable set produceNum = produceNum - 1, updateTIme = now() where produceId = #{id}
update usertable join producetable p on usertable.name = p.customer set credit = credit - p.produceCredit, p.updateTime = now() where p.produceId = #{id}
mapper.select: where produceName like CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') and produceNum > 0 ORDER BY updateTime DESC;
where produceNum > 0 ORDER BY updateTime DESC;
